summary: I WAS HIT HEAD ON BY A DODGE DURANGO, WHO RAN A RED LIGHT.  I HIT MY HEAD ON THE STEERING WHEEL THE SHOULDER SEAT BELT SAVED ME BECAUSE THE AIRBAG DIDN'T INFLATE ON IMPACT EVEN THOUGH SENSOR IS VISIBLY SHOWING IN THE DAMAGE, THAT MAY BE CONSIDERED A TOTAL LOSS.    THANK YOU VERY MUCH, GLENN SCHWEICKERT.      *NLM
